MemberSignature.Usage: preferenceActivity.StartPreferencePanel (fragmentClass, args, titleRes, titleText, resultTo, resultRequestCode)

Docs.param: Full name of the class implementing the fragment.
Any desired arguments to supply to the fragment.
Optional resource identifier of the title of this fragment.
Optional text of the title of this fragment.
Optional fragment that result data should be sent to. If non-null, resultTo.onActivityResult() will be called when this preference panel is done. The launched panel must use when done.
If resultTo is non-null, this is the caller's request code to be received with the result.
Docs.summary: Start a new fragment containing a preference panel.
